verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm קַוֹּ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> I waited קִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6960><s%> patiently יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD וַיֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> and he inclined אֵ֝לַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> unto me and heard שַׁוְעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7775><s%> my cry

וַיַּעֲלֵ֤נִי ׀ <S%H5927><s%> He brought me up מִבּ֥וֹר <S%H953><s%> pit שָׁאוֹן֮ <S%H7588><s%> also out of an horrible מִטִּ֪יט <S%H2916><s%> clay הַיָּ֫וֵ֥ן <S%H3121><s%> out of the miry וַיָּ֖קֶם <S%H6965><s%> and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon סֶ֥לַע <S%H5553><s%> upon a rock רַגְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> my feet כּוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> [and] established אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <S%H838><s%> my goings

וַיִּתֵּ֬ן <S%H5414><s%> And he hath put בְּפִ֨י ׀ <S%H6310><s%> in my mouth שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָדָשׁ֮ <S%H2319><s%> a new תְּהִלָּ֪ה <S%H8416><s%> [even] praise לֵֽאלֹ֫הֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> unto our God יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְיִירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> [it] and fear וְ֝יִבְטְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> and shall trust בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> [is] that man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> that maketh יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִבְטַח֑וֹ <S%H4009><s%> his trust וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not פָנָ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> and respecteth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְ֝הָבִ֗ים <S%H7295><s%> not the proud וְשָׂטֵ֥י <S%H7750><s%> nor such as turn aside כָזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> to lies

רַבּ֤וֹת <S%H7227><s%> Many עָשִׂ֨יתָ ׀ <S%H6213><s%> works [which] thou hast done אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהַי֮ <S%H430><s%> my God נִֽפְלְאֹתֶ֥יךָ <S%H6381><s%> [are] thy wonderful וּמַחְשְׁבֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4284><s%> and thy thoughts אֵ֫לֵ֥ינוּ <S%H413><s%> toward אֵ֤ין ׀ <S%H369><s%> There עֲרֹ֬ךְ <S%H6186><s%> [which are] to us-ward they cannot be reckoned up in order אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> toward אַגִּ֥ידָה <S%H5046><s%> unto thee [if] I would declare וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <S%H1696><s%> and speak עָ֝צְמ֗וּ <S%H6105><s%> [of them] they are more מִסַּפֵּֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> than can be numbered

זֶ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> Sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֨ה ׀ <S%H4503><s%> and offering לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not חָפַ֗צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> thou didst not desire אָ֭זְנַיִם <S%H241><s%> mine ears כָּרִ֣יתָ <S%H3738><s%> hast thou opened לִּ֑י עוֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering וַ֝חֲטָאָ֗ה <S%H2401><s%> and sin offering לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁאָֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H7592><s%> hast thou not required

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Then said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָ֑אתִי <S%H935><s%> I Lo I come בִּמְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> in the volume סֵ֝֗פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> [it is] written עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> unto

לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת־ <S%H6213><s%> to do רְצוֹנְךָ֣ <S%H7522><s%> thy will אֱלֹהַ֣י <S%H430><s%> O my God חָפָ֑צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> I delight וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ <S%H8451><s%> yea thy law בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [is] within מֵעָֽי׃ <S%H4578><s%> my heart

בִּשַּׂ֤רְתִּי <S%H1319><s%> I have preached צֶ֨דֶק ׀ <S%H6664><s%> righteousness בְּקָ֘הָ֤ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation רָ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> in the great הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׂ֭פָתַי <S%H8193><s%> my lips לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶכְלָ֑א <S%H3607><s%> lo I have not refrained יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest

צִדְקָתְךָ֬ <S%H6666><s%> thy righteousness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not כִסִּ֨יתִי ׀ <S%H3680><s%> I have not hid בְּת֬וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> my heart אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> thy faithfulness וּתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ <S%H8668><s%> and thy salvation אָמָ֑רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I have declared לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not כִחַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3582><s%> I have not concealed חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> and thy truth לְקָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> from the great

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> from me O LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תִכְלָ֣א <S%H3607><s%> Withhold רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> not thou thy tender mercies מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> let thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> and thy truth תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> continually יִצְּרֽוּנִי׃ <S%H5341><s%> preserve

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אָפְפ֥וּ־ <S%H661><s%> have compassed עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and רָע֡וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evils עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֵ֬ין <S%H369><s%> else מִסְפָּ֗ר <S%H4557><s%> For innumerable הִשִּׂיג֣וּנִי <S%H5381><s%> have taken hold עֲ֭וֹנֹתַי <S%H5771><s%> me about mine iniquities וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not יָכֹ֣לְתִּי <S%H3201><s%> upon me so that I am not able לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to look up עָצְמ֥וּ <S%H6105><s%> they are more מִשַּֽׂעֲר֥וֹת <S%H8185><s%> than the hairs רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> of mine head וְלִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> therefore my heart עֲזָבָֽנִי׃ <S%H5800><s%> faileth

רְצֵ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> Be pleased יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> to help חֽוּשָׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> make haste

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ <S%H2659><s%> and confounded יַחַד֮ <S%H3162><s%> together מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> that seek נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> after my soul לִסְפּ֫וֹתָ֥הּ <S%H5595><s%> to destroy יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> it let them be driven אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <S%H3637><s%> and put to shame חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <S%H2655><s%> that wish רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> me evil

יָ֭שֹׁמּוּ <S%H8074><s%> Let them be desolate עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H1322><s%> of their shame הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> that say לִ֝֗י הֶאָ֥ח ׀ <S%H1889><s%> unto me Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <S%H1889><s%> aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ ׀ <S%H8055><s%> and be glad בְּךָ֗ כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H1245><s%> Let all those that seek יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֹֽ֝הֲבֵ֗י <S%H157><s%> in thee let such as love תְּשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8668><s%> thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I am עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <S%H34><s%> and needy אֲדֹנָ֪י <S%H136><s%> [yet] the Lord יַחֲשָׁ֫ב <S%H2803><s%> thinketh לִ֥י עֶזְרָתִ֣י <S%H5833><s%> upon me thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <S%H6403><s%> and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> O אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <S%H309><s%> make no tarrying
